title: print.css
content: /* @ global settings */ html,body{height:100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: none} body{font-family:'LinotypeUniversW01-Ligh 723631',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;color:#3e3d40;text-rendering:optimizelegibility;background:#fff} *{margin:0;padding:0} img,fieldset{border:none} a,a:link,a:visited{color:#3e3d40;text-decoration:none;outline:none} a:hover{color:#3e3d40} p{font-size:14px;color: #2e2d30;line-height:19px} p a{color:#2e2d30 !important} /* end global settings */ h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,strong,b { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-weight: normal; } .read-more {white-space: nowrap} #header-inner,#footer-inner,#header-top div,.bottom-inner,#content { max-width: 996px; min-width: 300px; margin: 0 auto; } #header { width: 100%; padding-bottom: 10px; margin-bottom: 38px; float: left; clear: left; background: url(../images/header-shadow.gif) repeat-x left bottom; } #header.header-home { padding-bottom: 20px; margin-bottom: 0; background: none; } #header.header-home #main-nav {padding-bottom: 0} #header.header-home #logo {margin-bottom: 0} #header-top {display: none} #header-inner,.header-top-inner {padding: 0 3%} #logo { margin: 21px 0 20px 0; float: left; } #search-field {display: none} #main-nav,#iphone-nav,#subnav-landscape {display: none} #teaser { width: 100%; margin-bottom: 25px; background: #f8f8f8; float: left; position: relative; } #teaser-inner,#teaser .orbit-wrapper { width: 100%; max-width: 1103px; margin: 0 auto; position: relative; } #teaser-inner img { width: 100%; float: left; } .teaser-overlay { background: #fff; position: absolute; width: 30%; padding: 1.5%; bottom: 15%; left: 4.9%; } .teaser-overlay h1 { font-size: 24px; color: #000; line-height: 24px; border-bottom: 1px solid #000; padding-bottom: 6%; } .teaser-overlay span { font-size: 11px; color: #50636d; width: 100%; margin-top: 4px; display: block; } ul.orbit-bullets {display: none} .width25 {width: 25%} .width50 {width: 50%} .float {float: left} .home-text-panel { width: 48.9%; margin-right: 1.1%; padding-bottom: 3.5%; float: left; } .home-text-panel h1 { font-size: 20px; color: #000; line-height: 24px; margin-bottom: 12px; width: 95%; } .home-text-panel p {width: 95%} .home-text-panel a.read-more {margin-right: 4.5%} a.read-more { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 14px; color: #3e3d40; float: right; } .home-panels { margin-bottom: 2.6%; border-bottom: 1px solid #e7e7e7; float: left; clear: left; } .home-cross { padding-bottom: 3.5%; margin-top: 2px; float: left; } .home-cross span { font-size: 11px; display: block; padding-bottom: 5px; float: left; clear: left; } .home-cross .logo { height: 68px; float: left; clear: left; } .home-cross img { max-width: 100%; margin-bottom: 27px; float: left; clear: left; } .home-cross p { width: 95%; float: left; clear: left; } .home-cross .width50 {float: left} .home-cross a.read-more { margin-right: 10%; float: right; clear: left; } .home-news { width: 46.8%; padding-right: 3.2%; float: left; } .home-news h2 { font-size: 20px; color: #67757d; padding-bottom: 8px; } .home-news p {padding-bottom: 8px} .home-news li { list-style: none; padding-bottom: 13px; } .home-news li span {font-size: 11px} .home-news li h3 { font-size: 14px; line-height: 19px; } .home-news li a:hover,a.read-more:hover {text-decoration: underline} .home-image img { width: 100%; float: left; } /* content */ #content {padding: 3%} #sidebar {display: none} #subnav {display: none} #main-content { width: 100%; float: right; } #main-content.small {width: 50%} .content-teaser { width: 100%; margin-bottom: 1.7%; position: relative; float: left; clear: left; overflow: hidden; } .content-teaser img { width: 100%; float: left; } .content-teaser .teaser-overlay { width: 35.4%; padding: 1% 0 3.4% 2.4%; background: #fff url(../images/deco-bar.gif) repeat-y; bottom: 20.5%; left: 3.9%; } .content-teaser .teaser-overlay h3 { font-size: 16px; color: #000; line-height: 18px; border-bottom: 1px solid #000; width: 94.5%; padding-bottom: 10px; margin-bottom: 3px; float: left; clear: left; } .content-teaser .teaser-overlay span { font-size: 10px; color: #000; float: left; clear: left; } .page-headline { width: 100%; padding: 0 1.2% 12px; position: relative; float: left; clear: left; } .page-headline h1,.page-headline h2 { font-size: 20px; line-height: 22px; } .page-headline h1 { color: #000; float: left; clear: left; } .page-headline h2 { font-family:'LinotypeUniversW01-Ligh 723631',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; color: #67757d; float: left; clear: left; } .page-headline a.rss { height: 37px; width: 38px; background: url(../images/rss.gif); position: absolute; right: 0; top: 0; } .page-headline .date { font-size: 12px; padding-bottom: 3px; float: left; clear: left; } #main-content p { width: 97.6%; padding: 0 1.2% 19px; float: left; clear: left; } .addthis_toolbox { margin: 0 1.2%; } #main-content h4 { font-size: 14px; color: #000; line-height: 19px; width: 97.6%; padding: 0 1.2%; float: left; clear: left; } #main-content ul { font-size: 14px; color: #2e2d30; line-height: 19px; width: 97.6%; padding: 0 1.2% 19px; float: left; clear: left; } #main-content ul li {margin-left: 3%} #main-content div.note { color: #000; outline: 1px solid #eee; width: 97.6%; margin: 0 0 22px 1.2%; float: left; clear: left; } #main-content div.note p {padding: 2% 1.9% 1.5%} #main-content.small div.note {padding: 3% 1.9% 3.5%} #main-content div.note a { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; color: #000 !important; text-decoration: underline; } .definition-list { width: 97.6%; margin: 0 0 0 1.2%; float: left; clear: left; } .definition-list dt { font-size: 16px; color: #67757d; width: 25%; padding: 13px 0 6%; border-top: 1px solid #e7e7e7; float: left; clear: left; } .definition-list dt strong {color: #000} .definition-list dd { width: 75%; padding: 13px 0 6%; border-top: 1px solid #e7e7e7; float: left; } #main-content .definition-list dd p { padding-left: 3.1%; border-left: 1px solid #e7e7e7; } #main-content .definition-list dd p a {text-decoration: underline} .three-columns,.two-columns,.four-columns { width: 100%; padding: 0 0 30px 1.2%; float: left; } .two-columns .column { width: 46.1%; margin-left: 5.4%; float: left; } .three-columns .column { width: 30.38819333333333%; margin-left: 3.4%; float: left; } .four-columns .column { width: 20.749%; margin-left: 5%; float: left; } .three-columns .column.column_1,.two-columns .column.column_1,.four-columns .column.column_1 {margin-left: 0} .three-columns .column img,.two-columns .column img,.three-columns .column img,.four-columns .column img { width: 100%; margin-bottom: 10px; float: left; } .three-columns .column h5,.two-columns .column h5,.four-columns .column h5 { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Ligh 723631',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: #67757d; padding-bottom: 5px; } .three-columns .column h5 strong,.two-columns .column h5 strong,.four-columns .column h5 strong {color: #000} .three-columns .column p,.two-columns .column p,.four-columns .column p {padding: 0 !important} .align-right { width: 46.1%; padding: 5px 0 2.8% 4.5%; float: right; } .align-left { width: 46.1%; padding: 5px 4.5% 2.8% 0; float: left; } #sidebar-right { width: 22%; padding-left: 3%; float: right; } .sidebar-right-inner { width: 100%; float: right; border: 1px solid #fff; } #sidebar-right h3,h3.contact-headline { font-size: 14px; color: #000; border-top: 1px solid #e7e7e7; border-bottom: 1px solid #e7e7e7; width: 92%; padding: 7px 4% 7px; margin-bottom: 1px; float: left; clear: left; } #sidebar-right a.pdf,.sidebar-small a.pdf,#sidebar a.pdf { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-decoration: underline; margin: 15px 1.2%; float: left; clear: left; background: url(../images/download-icon.gif) no-repeat left 1px; padding-left: 17px; } .download-sidebar { padding-bottom: 15px; border-bottom: 1px solid #e7e7e7; } .contact-panel { font-size: 14px; line-height: 19px; width: 92%; padding: 5% 4% 10%; background: #f7f7f7; float: left; clear: left; } .contact-panel strong {color: #67757d} .contact-panel a { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; color: #000; text-decoration: underline; } .email {word-wrap: break-word} .sidebar-small {display: none} #news-overview {padding-top: 7px} #news-overview article { padding-bottom: 36px; float: left; clear: left; } #news-overview .date { font-size: 12px; padding: 0 1.2% 1px; float: left; clear: left; } #news-overview h4 { font-size: 14px; float: left; clear: left; } #news-overview p {padding-bottom: 3px} #news-overview a.read-more,#news-overview a.pdf { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-decoration: underline; margin: 0 1.2%; float: left; clear: left; } #news-overview a.pdf { background: url(../images/download-icon.gif) no-repeat left 1px; padding-left: 17px; } #news-overview a.read-more { text-decoration: none; float: left; } #news-overview a.read-more:hover {text-decoration: underline} .news-pager { width: 100%; margin: 0 1.2%; padding-top: 8px; border-top: 1px solid #e7e7e7; float: left; clear: left; } .news-pager span { font-size: 14px; padding-right: 15px; float: left; } .news-pager ul { margin: 0; float: left; clear: none; } .news-pager li { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 14px; list-style: none; margin: 0 3px; float: left; } .news-pager li a { text-decoration: underline; color: #000; } .news-pager li.active a { text-decoration: none; color: #67757d; } .news-pager li a:hover {text-decoration: none} #news-archive { width: 100%; padding-bottom: 60px; border-left: 1px solid #e7e7e7; } #news-archive h4 { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Ligh 723631',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 20px; color: #67757d; margin-left: 5%; padding-bottom: 4px; } #news-archive li { font-size: 14px; list-style: none; width: 100%; } #news-archive li a { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; color: #000; text-decoration: underline; padding: 3% 0 3% 5%; display: block; } #news-archive li.active a { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Ligh 723631',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; color: #67757d; text-decoration: none; background: #f7f7f7; } #content-tabs { width: 97.6%; margin: 0 1.2% 20px; padding-bottom: 5px; background: url(../images/tabs-shadow.gif) repeat-x left bottom; float: left; } #content-tabs li { font-size: 12px; list-style: none; border: 1px solid #e7e7e7; border-bottom: none; background: #fff; margin-left: 10px; float: left; } #content-tabs li a { padding: 8px 14px; display: block; } #content-tabs li.active { padding-bottom: 5px; margin-bottom: -5px; } #content-tabs li.active a { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; color: #67757d; } p.quote { width: 97.6%; margin: 0 1.2% 20px; padding: 0 !important; background: #f4f4f4; } .quote q { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 19px; color: #000; line-height: 25px; margin: 2.3% 2% 5px 2%; float: left; clear: left; } .quote span { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 14px; color: #67757d; margin: 0 2% 2% 2%; float: left; clear: left; } a#contact-us {display: none} .detail-box-wrapper {width: 100%} .detail-box-wrapper .detail-box-text p {width: 60.6666666% !important} .detail-box { font-size: 12px; width: 30.93333333%; padding: 1.4% 1.2% 1.5% 1.2%; margin: 0 1.45% 20px 0; border: 1px solid #e7e7e7; -webkit-box-shadow: 2px 2px 5px #f1f1f1; -moz-box-shadow: 2px 2px 5px #f1f1f1; box-shadow: 2px 2px 5px #f1f1f1; float: right; } .detail-box h5 {font-size: 14px} .detail-box dl { line-height: 19px; width: 100%; margin-bottom: 19px; float: left; clear: left; } .detail-box dl dt { width: 50%; float: left; clear: left; } .detail-box dl dd { width: 50%; float: left; } .detail-box p { font-size: 12px; line-height: 19px; } .detail-box a.link { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 14px; float: left; clear: left; } .full-image { width: 97.6%; padding: 0 1.2% 19px; float: left; clear: left; } .full-image img { width: 100%; float: left; clear: left; } a.show_video { width: 100%; display: block; float: left; position: relative; } .play-button { height: 100%; width: 100%; background: url(../images/play-video.png) no-repeat center center; position: absolute; left: 0; top: 0; display: block; } .downloads .three-columns {padding-bottom: 4%} .downloads .three-columns img {margin-bottom: 4.7%} .content-slideshow { width: 97.6%; margin: 0 1.2% 19px 1.2%; position: relative; float: left; clear: left; } .content-slideshow img {width: 100%} .content-slideshow:hover a.prev,.content-slideshow:hover a.next, .orbit-wrapper:hover a.prev,.orbit-wrapper:hover a.next {opacity: 1} .content-slideshow a.prev,.content-slideshow a.next, .orbit-wrapper a.prev,.orbit-wrapper a.next { top: 50%; margin-top: -20px; z-index: 999; opacity: 0; transition: opacity .25s ease-in-out; -moz-transition: opacity .25s ease-in-out; -webkit-transition: opacity .25s ease-in-out; width: 41px; height: 41px; display: block; position: absolute; } .content-slideshow a.prev,.orbit-wrapper a.prev { background: url(../images/slideshow-nav.png) no-repeat left top; left: 1.2%; } .content-slideshow a.next,.orbit-wrapper a.next { background: url(../images/slideshow-nav.png) no-repeat right top; right: 1.2%; } #map_canvas { width: 100%; height: 355px; } .content-row { width: 100%; padding: 4.7% 0; border-top: 1px solid #e6e6e6; float: left; } .content-row .text { width: 43.8%; padding-left: 1.2%; padding-right: 8.5%; float: left; } .content-row .text h5 { font-size: 14px; color: #3e3d40; line-height: 19px; } .content-row .text p { padding-bottom: 0 !important; padding-left: 0 !important; } .content-row .text .read-more { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 14px; color: #3e3d40; white-space: nowrap; float: right; } .content-row img { width: 41.4%; float: left; } table { float: left; line-height: 19px; width: 100%; margin-bottom: 19px; float: left; clear: left; } .content-headline-inner {margin-left: 3.4%} footer,#footer-inner,.addthis_toolbox,.toggle-menu,.bottom {display: none} .clear:after{content:".";display:block;height:0;clear:both;visibility:hidden} .clear{display:block} *html .clear{height:1%}
